eligibility.notes: 7-11 COD; opened ~18h after pickup; Order is not yet completed

snadResult.label: SNAD
snadResult.reason: The buyer reports the actual hoodie color is significantly darker than shown in the seller’s bright-window photos. The seller’s photos were taken under strong natural lighting, which caused a discrepancy in the color. This is a misleading image based on the difference in appearance.

primaryOption.label: Return & Full Refund
primaryOption.details: Seller reimburses NT$60 COD shipping and provides a return label.

alternativeOption.label: Partial Refund & Keep Item
alternativeOption.details: Buyer keeps the item; offer 15–30% partial refund.

caseSummary:
Order: TW-15011
Eligibility: R1/R2/R3 ✅
Key: The buyer reports the actual hoodie color is significantly darker than shown in the seller’s bright-window photos. The seller’s photos were taken under strong natural lighting, which caused a discrepancy in the color. This is a misleading image based on the difference in appearance.
Decision: SNAD
Outcome: The system approved the return request.
